tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maps (
    map_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    map_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    map_coordinates VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    map_boundary_polygon GEOMETRY NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE coordinates (
    coord_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 7),
    longitude DECIMAL(10, 7),
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    map_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES maps(map_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maps (
 map_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 map_name VARCHAR,
 map_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE coordinates (
 coordinate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 longitude DECIMAL,
 latitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE boundaries (
 boundary_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 boundary_name VARCHAR,
 boundary_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE urban_planning (
 project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR,
 project_description TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Maps (id INT PRIMARY KEY, map_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, map_data TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Coordinates (id INT PRIMARY KEY, latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL, longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Boundaries (id INT PRIMARY KEY, boundary_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, boundary_data JSON NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE UrbanAreas (id INT PRIMARY KEY, area_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, population INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Streets (id INT PRIMARY KEY, street_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, length_in_meters DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL)
